thread.title: Verona man indicted for producing child porn
thread.title_full: Verona man indicted for producing child porn - FOX 14 TV Joplin and Pittsburg News Weather Sports |

author: News Release
title: Verona man indicted for producing child porn
text:
SPRINGFIELD, MISSOURI - Tammy Dickinson, United States Attorney for the Western District of Missouri, announced that a Verona, Mo., man was indicted by a federal grand jury today for producing and receiving child pornography.
Allen S. Worley, 41, of Verona, was charged in a two-count indictment returned by a federal grand jury in Springfield, Mo.
Todayâ€™s indictment alleges that Worley attempted to use a minor, identified as Jane Doe #1, to produce child pornography between Dec. 9, 2014, and April 16, 2015. Worley is also charged with receiving child pornography over the Internet.
Dickinson cautioned that the charges contained in this indictment are simply accusations, and not evidence of guilt. Evidence supporting the charges must be presented to a federal trial jury, whose duty is to determine guilt or innocence.
This case is being prosecuted by Assistant U.S. Attorney James J. Kelleher. It was investigated by the Southwest Missouri Cyber Crime Task Force and the Aurora, Mo., Police Department.
